title: France

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Listening Post: Receive all notifications that a target receives.
- Gain Sources: Receive an Investigator (35) result on your target.
- Neutralize Governor: Remove one random ability from your target for two days and two nights after this one. (Costs 4 Gold)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Using Gain Sources will not inform the target that they were investigated and will never have a Civilization role.
- You will learn who all opposing evil factions visit each night, but not their roles or effects.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were shot by the French imperial guard.” (Factional Kill)
“Your ability was neutralized! You cannot use ‘________________’ for two nights.” (Neutralize Governor, target)

desc:
Post 2143
*“How can anyone govern a nation that has two hundred and forty-six different kinds of cheese?” -Charles de Gaulle*
